house_listing.house_location: 102 E. SCHUBERT & 303 N. ADAMS Fredericksburg, TEXAS 78624
house_listing.house_description: IN THE HEART OF THE HISTORICAL DISTRICT, THESE TWO HOMES HAVE CHARM, CHARACTER AND LOCATION! BOTH HOMES ARE 1 BEDROOM & 1 BATH. THE LIMESTONE HOME IS 1,072 SF HAS WOOD FLOORS AND IS IDEAL FOR A B&B. THE STUCCO EXTERIOR HOME IS ALSO BUILT OF STONE, AND THE INTERIOR WALLS HAVE EXPOSED LIMESTONE. THIS ONE HAS A WONDERFUL FIREPLACE, 11’ CEILINGS, SALTILLO TILE FLOORS, AND EVEN A CLAWFOOT TUB. YARD HAS SPRINKLER SYSTEMS. THIS IS A RARE CHANCE TO OWN ONE ON THE PREMIER PROPERTIES IN FREDERICKSBURG.
